parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.64

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array containing names and values of the sound controllers that can be used in simple expressions when configuring sounds.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getAllSoundControllers''' vehicle
</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - must be a vehicle (does not work on soldiers)
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>["controllerA", valueA], ["controllerB", valueB], ...]
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[getAllSoundControllers]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code>
<ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>Result: [["rpm",0],["randomizer",0.874332],["speed",0],["thrust",0],...]]
</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Sound]], [[getSoundController]], [[getSoundControllerResult]], [[getEnvSoundController]], [[getAllEnvSoundControllers]], [[getCustomSoundController]], [[setCustomSoundController]], [[getCustomSoundControllerCount]]
</value></part></template>
